featured.text: More and more new cars can reverse-park, read traffic signs, maintain a safe distance in steady traffic and brake automatically to avoid crashes.
When the shuttle touches the land, a drag parachute opens to steady the aircraft, get the speed right, and help the brakes on the landing-gear wheels to bring it to a complete stop. 49.

definition.zh_def: 剎車裝置，用於減速或停止移動的物體。
definition.en_def: A device used to slow down or stop the movement of a vehicle or machine.
definition.example: Make sure to press the brake gently when you want to stop.
